{"abstract": "Asahi Kasei will buy the battery business and 3M will purchase the filtration operation in a deal with a $3.2 billion enterprise value.", "web_url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2015/02/24/business/dealbook/polypore-sells-industrial-businesses.html", "snippet": "Asahi Kasei will buy the battery business and 3M will purchase the filtration operation in a deal with a $3.2 billion enterprise value.", "lead_paragraph": "Polypore International, a specialty manufacturer in North Carolina, agreed on Monday to sell its battery business to the Asahi Kasei Corporation of Japan and its filtration business to 3M in related transactions.", "source": "The New York Times", "multimedia": [], "headline": {"main": "Polypore Sells Industrial Businesses", "kicker": null, "content_kicker": null, "print_headline": "", "name": null, "seo": null, "sub": null}, "keywords": [{"name": "organizations", "value": "3M Company", "rank": 1, "major": "N"}, {"name": "organizations", "value": "Asahi Kasei Corp", "rank": 2, "major": "N"}, {"name": "organizations", "value": "Polypore International Inc", "rank": 3, "major": "N"}, {"name": "glocations", "value": "Japan", "rank": 4, "major": "N"}, {"name": "glocations", "value": "North Carolina", "rank": 5, "major": "N"}], "pub_date": "2015-02-23T13:38:04+0000", "document_type": "article", "news_desk": "Dealbook", "section_name": "Business Day", "subsection_name": "DealBook", "byline": {"original": "By Dealbook", "person": [{"firstname": "Dealbook", "middlename": null, "lastname": "", "qualifier": null, "title": null, "role": "reported", "organization": "", "rank": 1}], "organization": null}, "type_of_material": "News", "_id": "nyt://article/7287c2aa-b626-5443-a243-2136fc62a82c", "word_count": 197, "uri": "nyt://article/7287c2aa-b626-5443-a243-2136fc62a82c"}
